UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structural and functional characterization of mycobactericidal ubiquitin-derived peptides in model and bacterial membranes.
Literature.Author: Foss MH, Powers KM, Purdy GE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus megaterium 899(MBC90=50µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MBC90=>100µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MBC90=>400µM)
